BERN , Switzerland , May 19 ( UPI ) -- Swiss voters have shot down a government plan to procure nearly two dozen Saab - made Gripen jet fighters from Sweden , the government reported on Monday .
BERN , Switzerland , May 19 ( UPI ) -- Swiss voters have shot down a government plan to procure nearly two dozen Saab - made Gripen jet fighters from Sweden , the government reported on Monday .
The Swiss government said 53.4 percent of those voting on Sunday were against funding the procurement , which would have cost $ 3.5 billion .
The people have spoken , said Susanne Leutenegger Oberholzer , a Social Democrat member of parliament .
